MAN.TITLE: ntsc2rgb
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Converts from YIQ to RGB colorspace

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: A RGB image (M x N x 3) in 0-1 range or a RGB colormap (M x 3) in 0-1 range
A YIQ image (M x N x 3) in 0-1 range or a YIQ colormap (M x 3) in 0-1 range

DESCRIPTION.P: ntsc2rgb(YIQ) converts an YIQ image or colormap from YIQ to RGB colorspace. The YIQ model is used in NTSC and European TV's.
